articles.title: World’s biggest miner scraps immediate thermal-coal exit
articles.description: BHP Group said it failed to find a buyer for the Mt Arthur mine, one of Australia’s biggest coal operations, and would aim to close it in 2030
articles.content: The worlds largest mining company abandoned the sale of its last thermal coal mine, and said it would aim to close the Australian pit in 2030.
